title: Flood risk perceptions in Florida cities
cardTitle: Florida flood risk: sandbags vs vibes
cardDescription: Florida cities pick lifeboats: sandbags or denial.
modalDescription: Two Florida cities face the same flood math. One shrugs and packs flip-flops, the other stockpiles sandbags and sketches ark plans. Same risk charts, wildly different vibes, and a reminder that perception drives preparedness.
